data.message: My little brother Logan, would've love to have Eminem clothing, unfortunately he commited sucide at age 36, it will be two weeks tomorrow and we are all still grieving. We don't know why and there are so many questions that we have but we won't get the answers for. All we know is the he truly love your music and that it did help him express his feeling thru your music. He thought you would be awesome to meet and your a true music legend in his eyes. would love to get you to do something in the Memory of my little brother Logan as you were true to his heart.
